meanings.definition: A fine threadlike strand growing from the skin of humans, mammals, and some other animals.
meanings.sent1: She found a few stray hairs on her pillow.
meanings.sent2: Her long hairs shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hairs seemed to have a mind of their own, sticking out in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The spider's web was delicate, made of fine hairs that glistened in the morning dew.
meanings.sent5: The hairs on the back of his neck stood up as he heard a strange noise.

meanings.definition: A single strand of a person's hair.
meanings.sent1: She carefully braided her hair into three separate hairs.
meanings.sent2: He found a gray hair among his black ones.
meanings.sent3: The hairdresser joked that cutting one hair would bring seven years of bad luck.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a golden thread, shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The single hair on the comb seemed to mock him for his receding hairline.

meanings.definition: A very small quantity or extent.
meanings.sent1: He only had a few hairs of patience left before losing his temper.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a few more hairs of salt to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The hairs of doubt crept into her mind as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent4: The hairs of hope were all he needed to keep going.
meanings.sent5: The hairs of sunlight peeked through the dark clouds, promising a better day.
